languages.text: "В необозримой щедрости своей он повелел выдать каждому нуждающемуся по дневному пайку и индивидуальной топливной ячейке, дабы в сей день всякий был сыт и пребывал в тепле. Славьте великодушие Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] В качестве своего первого деяния Вольный торговец пожелал раздать деньги нуждающимся!

languages.text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"
languages.original_text: "В необозримой щедрости своей он повелел выдать каждому нуждающемуся по дневному пайку и индивидуальной топливной ячейке, дабы в сей день всякий был сыт и пребывал в тепле. Славьте великодушие Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed to give every soul in need a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

"In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed to give every soul in need a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

"In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

"In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

"In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

languages.text: “行商浪人以{mf|他|她}深不可测的仁慈，下令给每个人颁发一天的口粮与个人燃料电池，让所有人都能在这一天得到食物与温暖。赞美行商浪人的慷慨！”
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人以{mf|他|她}深不可测的仁慈，下令给每个人颁发一天的口粮与个人燃料电池，让所有人都能在这一天得到食物与温暖。赞美行商浪人的慷慨！”

languages.text: «En su incomparable benevolencia, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha decretado que toda persona reciba raciones para un día y una célula de combustible personal para que todos tengan comida y calor en esta fecha. ¡Loada sea su munificencia!».
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: «En su incomparable benevolencia, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha decretado que toda persona reciba raciones para un día y una célula de combustible personal para que todos tengan comida y calor en esta fecha. ¡Loada sea su munificencia!».

languages.text: 「計り知れない慈悲の心で、自由開拓者は、すべての魂に1日分の食料と個人用燃料電池を与えると布告された。これで、今という日にすべての民が食事にありつき、暖かく過ごすことができる。自由開拓者の懐の深さを讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: 「計り知れない慈悲の心で、自由開拓者は、すべての魂に1日分の食料と個人用燃料電池を与えると布告された。これで、今という日にすべての民が食事にありつき、暖かく過ごすことができる。自由開拓者の懐の深さを讃えよ！」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler hat in seiner|Die Freihändlerin hat in ihrer} unerschöpflichen Güte bestimmt, dass jede Seele eine Tagesration und eine eigene Treibstoffzelle bekommt, damit an diesem Tag alle satt sind und es warm haben. Gepriesen sei die Großzügigkeit {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler hat in seiner|Die Freihändlerin hat in ihrer} unerschöpflichen Güte bestimmt, dass jede Seele eine Tagesration und eine eigene Treibstoffzelle bekommt, damit an diesem Tag alle satt sind und es warm haben. Gepriesen sei die Großzügigkeit {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: « Dans son infinie bienveillance, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a décrété que chaque âme recevrait une ration pour la journée et une cellules de carburant personnelle pour que chacun puisse se nourrir et se chauffer aujourd'hui. {mf|Loué soit le libre-marchand|Louée soit la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: « Dans son infinie bienveillance, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a décrété que chaque âme recevrait une ration pour la journée et une cellules de carburant personnelle pour que chacun puisse se nourrir et se chauffer aujourd'hui. {mf|Loué soit le libre-marchand|Louée soit la libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, bugün herkesin karnı tok olsun ve kimse üşümesin diye sonsuz iyilikseverliğiyle herkese bir günlük kumanya ve kişisel yakıt hücresi verilmesini emretti. Hür Tacir'in eli açıklığına şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "In {mf|his|her} unfathomable benevolence, the Rogue Trader has decreed that every soul be given a day's rations and a personal fuel cell so that all may be fed and warm on this day. Praise the Rogue Trader's magnanimity!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, bugün herkesin karnı tok olsun ve kimse üşümesin diye sonsuz iyilikseverliğiyle herkese bir günlük kumanya ve kişisel yakıt hücresi verilmesini emretti. Hür Tacir'in eli açıklığına şükürler olsun!"
